name: Mississippi Caviar
author: lck5002
summary: I got this recipe from my sister who changed it up a bit to suit our liking.  Always a hit at family affairs! Serve with tortilla chips. The longer its sits, the spicier it will get.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies, drained
1  roma (plum) tomato, chopped - or more to taste
3 tablespoons pickled jalapeno pepper rings, finely minced
½ cup Italian-style salad dressing, or more to taste
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: In a large bowl, lightly stir together the corn, black beans, canned tomatoes with chilies, avocado, roma tomato,  onion, jalapenos, and salad dressing until well combined
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and hot pepper sauce to taste
